mapper.sql: d.Drop_Id, d.Drop_Date, d.Drop_Reason, d.isPay, d.Drop_Handler, d.JW_Approval, d.JW_AppName, d.JW_AppTime, d.JW_DropNameApp, d.JW_DropTimeApp, d.AddTime, d.DeleteName, d.DeleteTime, d.TimeLiness, d.Student_Id, d.Course_Id, d.CourseDetails_Id, d.Classes_Id
mapper.select: select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.Drop_Id = #{dropId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.TimeLiness=0

select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.Student_Id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.TimeLiness=0

select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.Classes_Id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.TimeLiness=0

select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.Course_Id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.TimeLiness=0

select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.Coursedetails_Id = #{coursedetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and d.TimeLiness=0

select ,s.Student_Name,cl.Classes_Name,co.Course_Name,cou.Coursedetails_Name from dropout d inner join student s on s.Student_Id=d.Student_Id inner join classes cl on cl.Classes_Id=d.Classes_Id inner join course co on co.Course_Id=d.Course_Id inner join coursedetails cou on cou.Coursedetails_Id=d.Coursedetails_Id where d.TimeLiness=0
mapper.insert: insert into dropout (Drop_Date, Drop_Reason, Drop_Handler, JW_AppName, JW_AppTime, JW_DropNameApp, JW_DropTimeApp, DeleteName, DeleteTime, Student_Id, Course_Id, CourseDetails_Id, Classes_Id) values (#{dropDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dropReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dropHandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jwAppname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jwApptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jwDropnameapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jwDroptimeapp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coursedetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update dropout
Drop_Date = #{dropDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Drop_Reason = #{dropReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isPay = #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Drop_Handler = #{dropHandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JW_Approval = #{jwApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JW_AppName = #{jwAppname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JW_AppTime = #{jwApptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JW_DropNameApp = #{jwDropnameapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JW_DropTimeApp = #{jwDroptimeapp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Student_Id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Course_Id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CourseDetails_Id = #{coursedetailsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Classes_Id = #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Drop_Id = #{dropId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dropout set isPay = #{ispay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JW_DropNameApp = #{jwDropnameapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JW_Approval = #{jwApproval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JW_DropTimeApp = #{jwDroptimeapp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Drop_Id = #{dropId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
